mapper.select: SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `mdl`.kind, `pf`.operate_result, `m`.quotation_first, `m`.scheduled_expedited, `m`.scheduled_date FROM material m JOIN v_model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = #{position_id} AND `pf`.operate_result = 0 AND `pf`.action_time is null ORDER BY agreed_date IS NULL, scheduled_date, reception_time

SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg + (qa_referee_time IS NOT NULL) * 10 as service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `pf`.operate_result as now_operate_result, `psf`.reason as now_pause_reason, `pf`.position_id as processing_position, (current_timestamp - `wpf`.action_time) > 2000000 as quotation_first, `m`.scheduled_expedited FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = #{position_id} AND `pf`.operate_result = 4 AND `pf`.action_time is null JOIN production_feature wpf ON `pf`.material_id = `wpf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = `wpf`.position_id AND `pf`.rework = `wpf`.rework AND `wpf`.pace = 0 LEFT JOIN (select * from pause_feature where PAUSE_FINISH_TIME IS NULL ) psf ON `pf`.material_id = `psf`.material_id AND `psf`.position_id = `pf`.position_id LEFT JOIN (select cast(material_id as unsigned) material_id, qa_referee_time from service_repair_manage where material_id like '0%') `srm` ON `m`.material_id = `srm`.material_id ORDER BY now_pause_reason DESC, qa_referee_time IS NULL, scheduled_date, now_operate_result DESC, reception_time

SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, COALESCE(`m`.wip_location, '同意') as wip_location, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type,
as quotation_first, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `m`.inline_time, pf.finish_time as quotation_time FROM material m JOIN v_model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = #{position_id} AND `pf`.operate_result = 2 AND `m`.break_back_flg = 0 AND `m`.inline_time IS NULL AND `m`.outline_time IS NULL AND pf.finish_time > current_date ORDER BY quotation_time DESC

SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `mdl`.name as model_name, `ctg`.name as category_name, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `cstm`.name as customer_name, `cstm`.vip as quotation_first, `m`.ocm_rank, `m`.ocm_deliver_date, `m`.osh_deliver_date, `m`.level, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.fix_type, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.section_id, `m`.reception_time, `m`.wip_location, `m`.scheduled_manager_comment, `m`.selectable, `m`.agreed_date, `m`.bound_out_ocm, `m`.area, `m`.scheduled_expedited FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN `category` ctg ON `mdl`.category_id = `ctg`.category_id LEFT JOIN customer cstm ON `m`.customer_id = `cstm`.customer_id WHERE `m`.material_id = #{material_id};
